CustomField.description: Who has power and influence to gain through a Grafana Deployment?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: --A score of 0 means we donâ€™t have a champion. --A score of 1 means the rep believes they have a champion, but has not tested that person. --A score of 2 means the rep has a champion, and has tested their willingness to get the deal in front of an economic buyer.
